column4: Tesla chief Musk says China trade rules uneven  asks Trump for help
column5: WASHINGTON/SHANGHAI Tesla Inc  Chief Executive Elon Musk took to Twitter on Thursday to call on U.S. President Donald Trump to challenge China's auto trade rules  which limit foreign ownership of Chinese ventures and impose steep tariffs on imported cars.

column4: BRIEF-Intel when asked about report of potential bid for Broadcom says 'focus is on integrating' previous acquisitions
column5: * WHEN ASKED ABOUT REPORT OF POTENTIAL BID FOR BROADCOM SAYS "FOCUS IS ON INTEGRATING' PREVIOUS ACQUISITIONS

column4: Intel considers deals including bid for Broadcom - WSJ
column5: March 9 Intel Corp is considering a range of acquisition options that could include a possible bid for Broadcom Ltd  the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday  citing people familiar with the matter.

column4: Broadcom promises on security  Qualcomm revamps board
column5: Broadcom Ltd  has promised not to sell critical national security assets to foreign buyers if its deal to buy chipmaker Qualcomm Inc  is approved  another effort by the Singapore-based firm to appease U.S. security concerns.
